sen.j: 姥 尉輔（うば じょうすけ）は歌舞伎作者の名跡。
sen.e: Josuke UBA is a professional name of writer of kabuki.
Josuke UBA is the professional name of a kabuki writer.
Josuke UBA is the family name of a kabuki writer.
sen.cmt: 名跡を他のファイルの訳語に合わせました。

sen.e: Nanboku TSURUYA (4-daime (fourth generation))
Nanboku TSURUYA (the fourth)
Nanboku TSURUYA (the fourth)

sen.j: 鶴屋南北 (4代目) (1755–1829) が合巻を書く際に使った筆名。
sen.e: It is a penname which Nanboku TSURUYA (4-daime) used when he wrote gokan (bound-together volumes of illustrated books).
It is a pen name which Nanboku TSURUYA (the fourth) used when he wrote gokan (bound-together volumes of illustrated books).
It is a pen name which Nanboku TSURUYA (the fourth) (1755-1829) used when he wrote gokan (bound-together volumes of illustrated books).

sen.j: 櫻田兵蔵 → 澤兵蔵 →（初代）勝俵蔵 → 四代目鶴屋南北（初代姥尉輔）
